column1: Honourable  Attorney  General  had  preferred  an

column2: Appellant,  Kaluarachchige  Kulasiri  (hereinafter  sometimes  called  and  referred  to  as

column1: the Appellant)  for committing  the  murder of Punchiralalage  Kusumawathie,  which  is

column2: punishable  under  Section  296  of the  Penal  Code.  After the  trial  the  Apppellant  was
